mapper.select: select from doctor_agreement_log where doctor_id=#{doctorId} and agreement_type=#{agreementType} and delete_flag limit 1

doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
agreement_type = #{agreementType,jdbcType=INTEGER},

modified_id = #{modifiedId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
